resources.string: Mr. Stephen Patterson, Mrs. Janet Dee, Matt Maffa, Connor, Teddy Finkelstein, Eric Leung, Missy Quiggley
To get started, log in using Google Plus (recommended)
Enter the number of different colors to be used in the next puzzle. In Hard mode 6 colors results in the most difficult puzzles. There can be any number of colors between 2 and 12.
Select the level for the new game.

Welcome to Sudo Squares! To start a game, choose how many colors you want from a palette for coloring the edges of square tiles. In the game, you try to match the colors of the 12 interior edges in your 3x3 puzzle by either rotating a tile or swapping it with another tile. To rotate a tile clockwise tap once on the tile; to rotate it counter clock-wise double tap the tile. In Easy mode, the tiles are in the right locations and only need to be rotated. In Medium and Hard modes tile orientations and locations are scrambled. In a Medium game a tile will glow when it lands in a correct location leading to a complete solution. \nScoring factors in time, number of moves, the difficulty as well as the number of colors in the game. Six colors generates the most difficult games but can result in your highest score if successful.\nWhen you beat a level, get social by posting a challenge to your Facebook friends!
You need to have at least 2 colors.
Placing the center tile. Good luck.
An addicting puzzle game with endless possibilities
A saved game was found. Would you like to load it? A new game will delete the old saved game.
Long press is disabled in easy mode. You don\'t need to swap the tiles.
